attributes.action: Remove the impossed 50mph speed limit on the Oxford Eastern bypass and increase to 70mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Oxford Eastern bypass currently has a 50mph speed limit put in place after a fatal accident which occurred in 2005; However speed was found not to be factor relating to this accident. However the limit has been put in place. I propose the removal of the speed limit and a return to the national speed limit of 70mph.
